nature_language: [当前位置北京,目标位置上海,旅行人数1,旅行天数3] 我准备从北京前往上海，停留3天，想要品尝一下上海的比如米其林三星饭馆这样的高端餐饮，酒店就省些钱，请给我一些推荐
nature_language_en: [Current location: Beijing, Destination: Shanghai, Number of travelers: 1, Number of travel days: 3] I am planning to travel from Beijing to Shanghai for a 3-day stay. I would like to try high-end dining options in Shanghai, such as Michelin three-star restaurants, but I want to save money on hotels. Please give me some recommendations.
